import React, {useState} from "react" import "./App.css" import MovieSelector from "./components/MovieSelector" import SeatAvailability from "./components/SeatAvailability" import SeatMatrix from "./components/SeatMatrix" import PriceCalculator from "./components/PriceCalculator" import IgrejaLogo from './components/IgrejaLogo' import MovieContext from './contexts/MovieContext' const config = require("./data/config.json") const App = () => { const [movies, EditMovies] = useState({ movieNames: { "Bloodshot": 10, "The girl on the Train": 8, "The invisible Man": 11, "Onward": 12, "My Spy": 9 }, moviePrice: 10, totalSeats: 0, ocupados: config.ocupados, seatNumbers: [] }) return (
) } export default App
